verses.name: 1 Corinthians 10:1
verses.text: Moreover, brethren, I would not that ye should be ignorant, how that all our fathers were under the cloud, and all passed through the sea;

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 10:2
verses.text: And were all baptized unto Moses in the cloud and in the sea;

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 10:3
verses.text: And did all eat the same spiritual meat;

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 10:4
verses.text: And did all drink the same spiritual drink: for they drank of that spiritual Rock that followed them: and that Rock was Christ.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 10:5
verses.text: But with many of them God was not well pleased: for they were overthrown in the wilderness.
